item.title: The Forest: Best Things To Craft First
item.description:
Summary

  • Crafting essential items like the weak spear and basic fire is crucial for survival early on.
  • Building a hunting shelter provides safety and save points for the player.
  • Consider crafting a houseboat for a secure base that cannibals can't reach.

In The Forest , crafting is a key element to surviving the harsh and dangerous environment of this horror game. Early preparation and efficient resource management can make the difference between life and death.

By focusing on essential items that address shelter, food, water, and defense, a player can significantly improve their chances of surviving the first few days of the game and progress further. Some early-game items are absolutely essential, especially those that help the player secure food and store water. A secure home is also something that the player needs to construct as soon as possible, although this can be left until crafting the basics has been covered.

8 Weak Spear

For Defense And Hunting

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Stick: 2

Starting out in The Forest follows a pretty common survival game template. The first thing that a player needs to do is secure a source of water and food, as well as create a basic shelter. Toward these goals, they'll need to craft something to hunt and defend themselves with. The Weak Spear is the simplest option.

The Weak Spear is, well, weak, but it is good enough in the early game to kill birds and small animals to eat and also to use as a defensive weapon, as it has a nice long reach, which means cannibals can be kept at bay. As it only takes two sticks to craft, it is a no-brainer.

7 Basic Fire

For Warmth And To Cook

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Stick: 2
    • Leaves: 7

Once a player has crafted the Weak Spear, they have a way to hunt small game and birds, and can also spear fish in pools of water. However, eating raw meat is not advisable. Furthermore, raw meat in the player’s inventory goes bad very quickly.

Crafting the Basic Fire gives the player a way to cook any meat they manage to harvest while hunting. This makes the meat more suitable for eating, and also extends the time it takes for the meat to go bad. Furthermore, a Basic Fire is all that is needed to keep a player warm at night.

6 Hunting Shelter

Basic Protection

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Sticks: 7
    • Logs: 7
    • Rocks: 6

As mentioned, the Basic Ffire is all a player needs to keep warm in the cold of the night, but it still makes sense to build a Hunting Shelter early on. Having a shelter gives two benefits. First, it can be used to sleep in at night, which moves the clock forward to morning. Second, it can be used to trigger a game save.

The Hunting Shelter is quick and easy to build and can be situated right next to a Basic Fire. The player will need to use their axe (which is a spawn item) to chop down a few trees to get the necessary logs, but this is pretty quick to accomplish.

5 Water Skin

Extending Exploration Range

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Rope: 1
    • Deer skin: 2

Food and drink are a major consideration in The Forest . Food is quite easy to come by, but fresh water is only available from pools of water, which the player can drink from. This means that, when out exploring, the player needs to find a water source regularly.

Crafting a Water Skin allows the player to carry a decent amount of water, which will keep them alive if they are exploring or hunting in a region where there is no easily accessible surface water to drink.

4 Crafted Bow

Simple Ranged Weapon

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Stick: 1
    • Rope: 1
    • Cloth: 1

Hunting with the Basic Spear is fine for small game, but for larger animals, a ranged weapon is a better option. The Crafted Bow is the easiest ranged weapon to make in The Forest . However, it must be said that it can take some time to master using it.

Normal arrows are pretty easy to make. They only require 1 stick and 5 feathers to make a stack of 5 arrows. Another advantage of the Crafted Bow is that it is quite stealthy, and can be used (carefully) to take out cannibals without triggering a larger attack.

3 Water Collector

Local Water Source

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Sticks: 4
    • Turtle shell: 1

Even if a player has crafted a Water Skin in The Forest , they will still need to make frequent trips to a source of clean water to refill it. This can become a bit of a chore, especially if the player has built a base some distance from such a water source.

Building a Water Collector makes sense, and it is something that every player will want to craft. It collects rainwater, which players can then drink. The turtle shell is very easy to get, as there are plenty of turtles along the shoreline of every beach.

2 Small Cabinet

To Store Resources

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Logs: 7

The player inventory in The Forest is pretty small, and after just an hour or two of gameplay, there is already a need for more storage. The easiest storage container to make is the Small Cabinet , and it only takes a few logs.

However, players should consider where they want to locate their main base before starting to make storage containers, as emptying them and moving them later on is going to be a bit of a problem. There are also specialized storage containers for weapons and other specific resources such as logs.

1 Secure Base

Consider A Houseboat

  • Crafting Requirements :
    • Sticks: 4
    • Logs: 40
    • Rope: 4

The only way to become entirely safe from cannibal attacks in The Forest , is to build a base they cannot get to. There are a few options for doing this. The player can build a tree house, or a custom-designed structure on land. However, this will still mean that cannibals can lay siege to the player’s base.

A good option is the House Boat. This can be built on the shoreline, and moved far enough out into the sea that cannibals cannot get to it. Additionally, it can be easily moved if the player decides to relocate to another area.

item.title: Pokemon Fan Creates Impressive Stained Glass Artwork of Zapdos
item.description:
Summary

  • A Pokemon fans shows off incredible stained glass art of Zapdos.
  • Pokemon has grown massively over the years, inspiring creativity in fans.
  • Fans eagerly await a new Pokemon game, engaging in crafting and playing older releases in the meantime.

Players continue to find new ways to showcase their love of the Pokemon franchise and its iconic pocket monsters, including one fan who made a gorgeous stained glass art piece of Zapdos. Pokemon has become one of the most popular and profitable brands on the planet, and fans of the beloved creatures enjoy sharing their favorite Pokemon in creative ways.

First introduced in Japan in 1996, the Pokemon brand has grown exponentially over the years, branching out from video games into a massively successful trading card game, highly-rated television series, and countless merchandise offerings in shops around the world. Many fans who grew up with the series have crafted their own original creations to display their favorite pocket monsters around the house, with a recent Zapdos art piece catching the eye of online community members.

Pokemon fan Cellocalypsedown shared a look at their stunning handmade stained glass artwork of Zapdos, which they made over the Christmas holiday. Zapdos is an Electric/Flying-type Legendary pocket monster and was among the 151 original Gen 1 Pokemon to be introduced to fans. The electrifying creature is one of the Kanto Legendary Birds, alongside Articuno and Moltres, and has a striking angular appearance. Wanting to capture the distinct aesthetic of Zapdos, OP decided to transform the Legendary Pokemon into a stained glass art piece. Utilizing their collection of glass tools and a repurposed creation from 2019, they beautifully crafted a stained glass Zapdos featuring the vibrant yellow feathers and red detailing of the Legendary bird.

Pokemon Zapdos Stained Glass Art

While there are a number of official Pokemon merchandise lines with thousands of goods to choose from, many fans enjoy putting their own creativity and talents to the test with custom pocket monster creations like the Zapdos stained glass piece. Fellow fans have voiced their appreciation for OP's Zapdos artwork, with many noting the beauty of a one-of-a-kind creation featuring an iconic Pokemon. Others shared fun suggestions for more pocket monsters that would translate well to the angular medium of stained glass, with Articuno and Porygon among the beloved creatures to be mentioned.

As players await more news of the next mainline Pokemon game, Pokemon Legends: Z-A , some are passing the time with fun crafting projects and playthroughs of older releases. Fans are excitedly anticipating brand-new pocket monsters to be introduced with the upcoming release, but for now, others are happily enjoying their favorite Pokemon creatures, like Zapdos, in their own unique ways.

item.title: Final Fantasy: Ranking The 16 Most Powerful Summons In The Entire Franchise
item.description:
Summary

  • Summons in the Final Fantasy series offer powerful support in battles, but some of the strongest ones are difficult to unlock and may not live up to expectations.
  • Diabolos from Final Fantasy Type-0 has the ability to drain enemies' health and heal itself, making it a force to be reckoned with in battle.
  • Bahamut is a recurring and powerful summon in the Final Fantasy series, with Bahamut ZERO being the strongest iteration, capable of unleashing devastating attacks when fully charged.

Summons are an integral part of any player’s strategy in the Final Fantasy series. Throughout the games, these beings have provided defensive, offensive, and healing support for the player’s party. A significant grind in any of the games is unlocking the more powerful summons.

In fact, the developers have locked a few away behind complex algorithms, formulaic attacks, and even the final bosses themselves because they’re so strong. Some of the strongest summons in Final Fantasy are so incredibly powerful that many people simply can't fathom the depths of their strength.

Updated on December 29, 2024, by Ritwik Mitra: Final Fantasy is a series full to the brim with numerous recurring elements, even if the stories of each mainline entry are self-contained. One of the most enduring aspects of the series is the many summons that players can call upon in battle. These powerful beings are a force to be reckoned with, rearranging the battlefield with their spectacular attacks that hit enemies for severe damage. Some of the best and most powerful summons in the Final Fantasy games are ones that players will love to use time and time again, especially on powerful foes who are a pain to deal with otherwise.

16 Crusader

So Powerful That Even The Party Isn't Safe From This Attack

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 6

On paper, Crusader should be one of the most impressive summons in the game. It's acquired after players beat all eight legendary dragons in the World of Ruin and provides a 50% bonus to MP growth on a level-up, which is useful for obvious reasons.

However, the ability that Crusader uses in battle hits friend and foe alike, leading to a game over unless players have certain safeguards set in place. This spell is bound by the damage cap too, meaning that players can use far safer attacks to unleash 9999 damage without endangering their party. The MP cost will probably be lower for this alternate approach too.

15 Pandemona

Since Most Enemies Are Weak To Wind, This Guardian Force Is Extremely Useful

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 8

The Wind element is overpowered in Final Fantasy 8 , which is why a summon that utilizes Wind in their attack is bound to be useful. Such is the case with Pandemona, a summon that looks like an extraterrestrial and can use Tornado Zone to decimate foes.

This makes Pandemona an important Guardian Force for players who aren't grinding out 100 units of each magic to break the Junction system. It levels the playing field and is perfect for battles against multi-enemy boss fights.

14 Eden

The Strongest Guardian Force In The Game

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 8

Eden is supposed to be the strongest summon in Final Fantasy 8 , with the player having to go through several hoops before standing a chance of attaining this powerful GF. The trek involved in getting this Guardian Force is pretty grueling and engaging, so it's easy to see why many players are disappointed when Eden doesn't live up to her full potential.

Her strength isn't so high that it makes her worth all the headache that players have to bear, even if players can boost their damage quite a bit because of how lengthy the animation for her summon is. The solitary 9999 damage is still pretty great, and Junctioning this GF allows players to unlock the full potential of their respective characters too!

13 Diabolos

Can Drain Enemy Health To Last Longer In Battle

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy Type-0

Diabolos from Final Fantasy Type-0 may not be the most powerful in terms of raw damage, but he sticks around longer in battle and can heal himself. This is because every attack drains the enemy’s health and is used to heal him.

There is also the signature move Gravitation Ball that will drain the health of enemies, form a large sphere of energy, and launch it at the enemy for massive damage. Combine the high damage with massive healing and Diabolos is a force to be reckoned with.

12 Ark

A Lengthy, Powerful Summon That's Acquired Near The End Of The Game

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 9

Boasting a nearly two-minute attack time, the Ark is a powerful summon that can dramatically change the outcome of any battle it’s called to. Two-minute cutscenes can seem excessive, but with a brutal shadow-based attack dealt to all enemies via Eternal Darkness it can be worth it.

The Ark also receives a boost to its spell power for every unit of Lapis Lazuli in the player’s inventory. Considering there are around 40 in the game that’s a solid power boost. Even without that boost, it has the highest base damage of any summon in Final Fantasy 9 . It’s too bad it’s locked behind the two toughest bosses in the game.

11 Odin

Can Unlock A Very Strong Insta-Kill Attack When Certain Conditions Are Met

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 9

Odin has appeared in several Final Fantasy games, but his most powerful version by far was in Final Fantasy 9 . If the player has 99 Ore in their inventory Odin has a 50% chance of killing any enemy outright with Zantetsuken.

Conversely, if the player has Odin’s Sword activated and no ore in their inventory, then Zantetsuken will deal increased damage to any enemy that survives the attack. It’s up to the player whether they want 50% of instant death or higher damage with every hit. Either way, it’s a brutal summon to have in battle.

10 Raiden

An Upgrade Over Odin Who Gives Amazing Level-Up Bonuses For Physical Fighters

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 6

Players love the idea of upgrading their summons after completing optional dungeons, with these rewards tasting sweeter as a result. Such is the case with Raiden, an Esper that can be acquired in Odin's place if players reach the end of the Ancient Castle.

It's a powerful summon that uses Shin-Zantetsuken on all enemies to inflict Instant Death. This may not be effective against enemies immune to this life-rending attack, but Raiden still stands out as one of Final Fantasy 6 's best summons courtesy of its amazing leveling bonuses that players can make the most of.

9 Magus Sisters

The Best Aeons Yuna Can Summon In The Game

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 10

The Magus Sisters are a trio of death on the battlefield. Cindy is a master of healing and magical attacks, Mindy deals black magic and defends the party, while Sandy is a master of physical attacks and support. Combined the three can damage all enemies, heal the party, and provide buffs.

Their signature move Delta Attack will cause all sisters to attack simultaneously and deal a little under six hundred thousand points of damage to a single target. The only catch and why they don’t rank higher is that the sisters cannot be directly controlled and will largely do what they want in battle.

8 Ramuh

A Massive Astral Who Uses His Judgment Bolt To Defeat Enemies Time And Time Again

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 15

Ramuh is one of the most legendary summons in Final Fantasy . He's consistently appeared across most Final Fantasy games, making a thunderous appearance whenever he's summoned — quite literally! — and decimating his enemies without too many problems. However, there's no denying that his power was simply eclipsed by the more high-level summons that players could find later on in each Final Fantasy game.

This isn't the case in Final Fantasy 15 , with the majority of summons leading to Ramuh appearing and thrusting his staff on the ground, electrocuting enemies for serious damage and taking them out in no time flat. The frequency of this summon over others makes him the highest damage-dealer out of all the Astrals whom players can interact with in the game.

7 Anima

A Tortured Aeon Who's Ridiculously Powerful

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 10

This summon with a tragic backstory is one of the more powerful in Final Fantasy 10 . Anima’s Pain attack can outright kill most opponents and deal significant damage to those who are immune to Death magic. Especially when it also bypasses any defenses the enemy may have.

Her signature move Oblivion is also devastating as it’s a sixteen-hit combo. In the remastered game, each hit can deal a max of 99,999 damage. If every hit is perfect she can deal a little over 1.5 million points of damage in one move.

6 Bahamut

One Of The Strongest Eikons In Final Fantasy 16

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 16

Bahamut is one of the most powerful Eikon in Final Fantasy 16 , and it's easy to see why this is the case. The King of all Dragons has been used time and time again to turn the tide of battle, with his imposing presence making him one of the toughest and most memorable boss fights in the entire game.

This Eikon wields the element of Light and can easily take out groups of enemies with the many abilities that Clive gains access to. Bahamut is truly powerful in every way, and players will love controlling this summon as they power through the many encounters in the game.

5 Shemhazai

Can Be Pretty Deadly If Used By An Experienced Damage Dealer

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy Tactics A2: Grimoire Of The Rift

Appearing as a special type of Summon called a Scion, Shemhazai is a ferocious ally to have. She has only one attack called Soul Purge that comes with 100% accuracy. Its damage is a bit different in that it can be one of the most brutal attacks in the franchise or mediocre at best.

This is because it’s entirely based on the total damage the character who’s summoned her has done throughout the game. If that character has been around for a while, fought many enemies, and dealt impressive damage Shemhazai’s attack will be incredible. With the right character, she can one-hit-kill just about anyone.

4 Bahamut ZERO

The Toughest And Most Powerful Summon In Type-0

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy Type-0

Bahamut ZERO is by far the strongest iteration of Bahamut in the games. It’s a level 99 Eidolon with the brutal breath attack Megaflare. Megaflare on its own is indeed strong, but its full potential is realized when it’s fully charged.

When fully charged Megaflare becomes Giga Flare, when that’s fully charged it becomes Tera Flare. This attack summons several Bahamuts to its side where they all concentrate a simultaneous attack on the same enemy.

3 Phoenix

Deals Immense Damage And Revives Party Members In The Process

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 7

Phoenix is easily the strongest summon in Final Fantasy 7 and is a strong contender for the entire franchise. The reason for this is its iconic move Rebirth Flame. Rebirth Flame will deal massive fire damage to every opponent on the battlefield.

But it will also cause all down party members to be instantly revived and fully healed if Concentrate is equipped. The only surviving party member can be the summoner who can call down Phoenix to just about kill the enemy party and bring all allies back to life.

2 Knights Of The Round

A Ridiculously Powerful Summon That Needs No Introduction

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 7

The most powerful summon in Final Fantasy 7 are the Knights of the Round who are absolute beasts in combat. During the move Ultimate End each of the thirteen knights will perform a separate attack that’s a combination of various elemental magics and physical strikes. All attacks will ignore magic defense.

This attack is enough to kill everything except the powerful Weapons, Final Boss, and Chocobos which can’t be killed anyway. It’s a one-hit wonder as the MP cost is absurd and the animation time is atrocious.

1 Yojimbo

Rich Players Can Defeat The Strongest Bosses With Ease

  • Strongest Appearance: Final Fantasy 10

The strongest summon in the franchise is Yojimbo from Final Fantasy 10 . This Samurai mercenary waits in a cave for a player to come along with enough Gil to hire them. His power comes from a player willing to spend hundreds of thousands of Gil for his services and a complex formula.

But with the right cash and a bit of luck, he can one-hit kill any foe in the game. That includes final bosses, secret bosses, and so on. It’s a move called Zanmato and requires a guide in and of itself to improve the odds of Yojimbo using it, but meeting those requirements makes him the single strongest summon of the Final Fantasy series .

item.title: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation 2 - Unicorn Gundam Awakened Trailer
item.description: Mobile Suit Gundam: Battle Operation 2 gives players a sneak peek at the Unicorn Gundam Awakened mobile suit and its many weapons. Armed with its UG Awakened Beam Magnum, dual Beam Gatling Guns, Shield Funnels, and more, the new Gundam makes it way to the game on December 31, 2024.

item.title: Roblox: Legends of Speed Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Legends of Speed Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Legends of Speed
  • How to Get More Legends of Speed Codes
  • Legends of Speed Tips and Tricks
  • The Best Roblox Games Like Legends of Speed
  • About the Legends of Speed Developers

In this article, Roblox fans will find a list of codes for Legends of Speed , as well as other valuable information about the game. Redeeming Legends of Speed codes can significantly increase Roblox players' speed, as well as provide a few extra gems. With this in mind, it's a good idea to redeem all of them to get as many additional freebies as possible.

Updated December 29, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Free codes are the perfect way to enhance your gaming experience effortlessly. Take advantage of them and watch your progress skyrocket.

All Legends of Speed Codes

Legends of Speed is not new, but the developers are updating it, and adding codes to improve the player's experience. Active codes that can help players in the game are listed below.

Codes Checked on December 29, 2024.

All Active Legends of Speed Codes

  • speedchampion000 - Use for 5,000 Gems.
  • racer300 - Use for 300 Steps.
  • SPRINT250 - Use this code for 250 Steps.
  • hyper250 - Use this code for 250 Steps.
  • legends500 - Use this code for 500 Gems.
  • sparkles300 - Use this code for 300 Gems.
  • Launch200 - Use this code for 200 Gems.

All Expired Legends of Speed Codes

There are no expired codes in the game, but active codes may soon become inactive, so players should hurry up and use them.

How to Redeem Codes in Legends of Speed

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming codes in Roblox : Legends of Speed is a very simple task that any user can handle. Everything that needs to be done to redeem codes is described in the short text instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Legends of Speed .
  • Find the blue “Codes” button on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this button.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Type Code Here."

How to Get More Legends of Speed Codes

To obtain additional codes for the Legends of Speed game, players may check the page of the game developer on Twitter. Additionally, players may frequently monitor this article, which is periodically updated with new codes. It is recommended that players use the active codes as soon as possible before they expire.

Legends of Speed Tips and Tricks

After redeeming the above-mentioned codes, players should try to earn Gems for achieving a certain speed, since this will also give them a good starting point. It is worth finding a slot machine with pets and buying some there, which will give players a little boost as well. After that, all they have to do is walk around and collect spheres, as well as jump through the rings. When players are confident enough in their abilities, they can participate in races.

The Best Roblox Games Like Legends of Speed

Although it has quite interesting gameplay, there are plenty of other great Roblox games like Legends of Speed . The ones listed below have similar mechanics, so they are sure to appeal to Legends of Speed fans who are starting to grow tired of the game:

  • Legend of Heroes Simulator
  • Dragon Race
  • Race Clicker
  • Car Dealership Tycoon
  • Cart Ride Simulator

About the Legends of Speed Developers

Legends of Speed was created by very productive developers, Scriptbloxian Studios. Besides this game, they have created many other interesting games that are also worthy of attention:

  • Ninja Legends
  • Ninja Legends 2
  • Drilling Simulator
  • Muscle Legends
